n1.speaker: Birb
n1.text: I did it! I actually cleared all my emails and finished that report! We're amazing [username]!

n2.speaker: Birb
n2.text: Oh look there is Crowley, my work friend. He's a bit silly.

n3.speaker: Crowley
n3.text: Hey Birb. Had a good day?

n4.speaker: Birb
n4.text: Yes, it was great thanks to the help [username] gave me! How about you Crowley?

n5.speaker: Crowley
n5.text: My day was awful! I was out of milk so I put ketchup in my coffee, it was awful.

n7.speaker: Crowley
n7.text: Anyway, a mysterious letter arrived for you, bye!

n8.speaker: Birb
n8.text: And there he goes. But what is this letter? I'll read it.

n9.speaker: Birb
n9.text: Strange, it just says "Prepare yourself for your downfall Birb"... Do you think I should be worried?

c1.speaker: Birb
c1.text: Do you think I should be worried?

choices.text: Yes, you should move to a different country!
Nah, it's just a prank clearly!
I don't know, does this happen often?

n11.speaker: Birb
n11.text: I hope so... still it's strange...

n13.speaker: Birb
n13.text: Anyway, I can ask my colleagues next time. Let's get some well deserved rest for a good day first!
